categoryDescription: Commands that should be available only to the dev

blacklistuser.description: blocks an user from using the bot
blacklistuser.noInput: You need to provide an id.
blacklistuser.notFound: Found no entry for this id.
blacklistuser.saved: `{user}` has been blacklisted from using the bot.
blacklistuser.removed: The blacklist entry for `{user}` has been removed.
blacklistuser.cantBlacklistOwner: I can't blacklist the owner of the bot!

eval.description: inject JavaScript code directly into the bot

reload.invalidCommand: This is not a valid command.
reload.invalidPath: The specified path does not exist! Please note the case sensitivity of the path.
reload.error:
An error occurred while reloading:
```{error}```
Check the console for more information.
reload.reloaded:
The following `{count}` command(s) has/have been reloaded:
{commands}

setactivity.invalidType:
This is not a valid type. Valid types are:
`{types}`

setchangelog.description: Updates the changelogs so users are up-to-date.
setchangelog.success: The changelog has been updated successfully.
